self_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael believes he will be the strongest he's ever been and that Ermes is unlucky to face him now. He thinks his preparation and strength will be too much for Ermes.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Michael thinks Ermes' strong hand and wrist will be a challenge, but he believes his riser and pronation will hold.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Very strong hand and wrist, good at controlling center.
Ermes Gasparini.health: Young and hungry, no mentioned health issues.
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Held the Super Heavyweight East vs West belt, gave Levan a tough match.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael thinks Levan is too powerful and will win 4-0, but if Jerry stops him once, the crowd energy could shift the match.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Levan's strength vs Jerry's back pressure.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Peak strength in arm wrestling history.
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Dominant performances, including against Ermes and Devon.

Jerry Cadorette.strength: Best back pressure in the sport.
Jerry Cadorette.previous_match_summary: Strong performances, but Michael doubts he can stop Levan.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Initially thought Brian was a heavy favorite, but now sees it as 60-40 due to Eddie's recent training with Neil Pickup.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Brian's size and strength vs Eddie's improved technique.

Brian Shaw.strength: Massive and strong, trained for a year.
Brian Shaw.previous_match_summary: Has been practicing arm wrestling for a while.

Eddie Hall.previous_match_summary: Showed smooth movements in recent training.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael thinks Paul is stronger and hungrier, though Krasimir is a multi-time world champion.
Michael thinks it's a toss-up due to Rustam's explosiveness and Sandris' endurance.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Rustam's short lever vs Sandris' long lever.

Rustam Babayev.previous_match_summary: Has pulled long matches in the past.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael thinks Corey is stronger, though Tobias is faster.

Corey West.previous_match_summary: Hasn't lost in North America in years.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Historically Matt wins, but Marcio looks in good form recently.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Matt's hand control vs Marcio's current form.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael thinks it's even, with Lars' press vs Lachlan's control.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Lars' press vs Lachlan's pronator control.

Lachlan Adair.previous_match_summary: Needs to control center to win.
